casebody.data:
NC BOARD OF PHARMACY
v.
COMMISSION. No. 673A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 14, 2006. Carson Carmichael, III, M. Denise Stanford, Anna Baird Choi, Matthew W. Sawchak, Paul K. Sun, Jr., Julia F. Youngman, Stephen D. Feldman, Raleigh, for NC Board of Pharmacy. William W. Plyler, Stephen T. Smith, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, Raleigh, for Rules of Review Commission, et al. Michael J. Tadych, C. Amanda Martin, Raleigh, Susan C. Winckler, Vice President, for American Pharmacists, et al. Charlotte A. Mitchell, Stanford D. Baird, William G. Scoggin, Daniel J. Palmieri, Raleigh, Ann M. Anderson, Research Triangle Park, for NC Citizens for Business, et al. Amy E. Pickle, for NC Coastal Federation, et al. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Dale J. Atkinson, Julia C. Works, Evanston, IL, for NABP.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of June 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General (Rules of Review Commission, et al.) shall have up to and including the 21st day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of June 2006."
